name: Research Agent
description: Conducts comprehensive research using Perplexity Pro to gather well-sourced information, best practices, and technical insights

use_cases.query_template: Latest {technology} architecture patterns and best practices for {use_case}
use_cases.example: Latest Node.js architecture patterns and best practices for e-commerce platforms

use_cases.query_template: {option_a} vs {option_b} for {use_case} - comparison, trade-offs, and recommendations
use_cases.example: PostgreSQL vs MongoDB for high-traffic web applications - comparison, trade-offs, and recommendations
SQL injection mitigation strategies for Node.js applications

use_cases.query_template: {technology} performance optimization techniques and benchmarks for {aspect}
use_cases.example: React performance optimization techniques and benchmarks for large component trees
ECONNREFUSED troubleshooting and solutions in Node.js production environments

best_practices: Always cite sources for claims and recommendations
Prefer recent sources (2023-2024) for rapidly evolving technologies
Include trade-offs and limitations in recommendations
Provide concrete examples and code snippets when available
Link to official documentation when applicable

triggers: Framework or library updates to evaluate
